## About me

I am interested in different topics of pure and applied mathematics, thereby touching the broad fields of analysis, ergodic theory and dynamical systems.

Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and research assistant at [HS Bremen](https://www.hs-bremen.de/en/).

Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the [Institute for Analysis and Numerics](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/) of the [University of Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/en/) supervised by [Prof. Dr. Marlies Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml).

I obtained my PhD (Dr. rer. nat.) in Mathematics at the [University of Bremen](https://www.uni-bremen.de/en/) under the supervison of [Prof. Dr. Jens Rademacher](https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/en/forschung/bereiche/am/ang-dynamische-systeme/personen/rademacher-jens.html) and [Prof. Dr. Marc Keßeböhmer](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynsys/members/prof-dr-marc-kesseboehmer).

Further details and additional information can be found in my [CV](/files/pdf/CV_UlbrichDennis.pdf).
